img.aria-label: Cannon Falls Area Schools response to COVID-19
Cannon Falls Area Schools response to COVID-19

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-OiUrBf jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: April 23rd, 2020

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Dear Cannon Falls Community:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: I hope this letter finds everyone safe, healthy and well. Today, Governor Tim Walz extended distance learning through the end of our school year, June 3, 2020. The last day for seniors will be May 29, 2020. Here are a few important items to note:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: May 1st and May 4th will be non-student instructional days for staff professional development on distance learning, as directed by Governor Walz. Emergency Care and meals will be provided on these days.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: At this time, graduation will still be on May 29th at 7 pm. The format of the ceremony will be determined at a later date and comply with all guidelines. Communication will be sent out to seniors and their parents/guardians regarding these changes.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: All activities and athletics are cancelled for the remainder of the school year. This includes all events and practices. School grounds remain closed.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Prom is cancelled.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Parents of students with medicine remaining in the health offices, please contact the nurse at

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: nurse@cf.k12.mn.us

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Emergency Care will continue to operate for Tier I and Tier II essential workers only.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The Food Service will continue to provide meals.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: If you have any questions or need assistance please continue to email:

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: helpdesk@cf.k12.mn.us

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Thank you families for your time, patience and understanding during these uncharted waters.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;
margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Superintendent Sampson

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

p.style: text-align: center;

div.p: *links within this communication may not work as this is a copy of the email sent out, please call the district with any questions*

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue;touchstart:p6p2H; touchmove:FwuNnf; touchend:yfqBxc(preventMouseEvents=true|preventDefault=true); touchcancel:JMtRjd;focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

div.p: March 19, 2020
Dear Cannon Falls Area Families:
As a follow-up to the email you received on March 17th, please see the updated important information below.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

div.p: The nursing staff will be available for questions by phone (507) 263-6800 ext 1435 Monday through Friday 8:00 AM - 3:00
PM and by email nurse@cf.k12.mn.us. Here are some additional resources for you.
Student services: Local Resources
Goodhue County Social Services Department
Mental Health Resources

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

div.p: We served 125 meals on the first day of our grab-n-go service! No applications needed for this grab-n-go service
that is free for all children 18 and under during this unique situation. We are encouraging all families to pick up the
grab-n-go meals to have at home, especially starting on March 30th. This will give your student a chance in their
remote setting to have breakfast and lunch.
In addition, with these unforeseen financial stressors, we are encouraging all families to visit their Infinite Campus
Parent Portal and complete the online application for educational benefits that will be in place when we are
authorized to return to school. By simply filling this form out you are benefiting all families within the district.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;
span.strong: Emergency Cannon Care (Cannon Kids regular programming is temporarily restructured to meet State guidelines)

div.p: ● Effective Friday, March 20th in accordance with state of Minnesota guidance Emergency Cannon Care will
consist of an expanded and updated list of professions supported by the program. Please see the attached
list of Tier 1 and Tier 2 qualifying professions. This will continue through the week of spring break, Monday,
March 23rd through Friday, March 27th. Please contact Community Education at 507-263-6800 ext. 1261 for
details.
● Families not currently registered with Emergency Cannon Care must meet the guidelines for care and will
need to complete a brief registration.
● The updated hours for Emergency Cannon Care will be 7:00 AM - 5:30 PM, Monday through Friday.
● If the closure continues March 30 and beyond, Emergency Cannon Care will continue to operate under these
same guidelines.
● Cannon Kids regular programming will resume when the school reopens.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

div.p: Distance Learning Plans for students will be communicated to you by the end of the day Friday March 20, 2020 and will
be posted on our website. These learning plans are for March 30, 2020 and beyond in the event the state continues with
the closures.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

div.p: The district is working on internet services for families that have been identified as in need of these services. A
technology help plan will be released with our Distance Learning Plan by the end of the day, Friday, March 20th.
For the most up-to-date information about COVID-19 please visit:
● https://www.health.state.mn.us/diseases/coronavirus/action.html
● https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/index.html
● https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/faq.html
● MDH COVID-19 Hotline at 651-201-5414

span.style: font-family: Open Sans;

div.p: With spring break next week, March 23rd - 27th, please stay tuned for potential future communications from the district
Thank you for your understanding, patience, and ongoing support during this rapidly changing situation. The safety and
support of our students, families, staff, and communities are our top priority. We are participating in all informational
calls with the Minnesota Department of Health and Minnesota Department of Education. We continue to closely monitor
the situation, follow guidance from health officials and will keep you informed, as needed, through our regular
communication channels (email, phone, website and social media).
Sincerely,
Jeff Sampson, Superintendent
Cannon Falls Area Schools

div.jsaction: touchstart:UrsOsc; click:KjsqPd; focusout:QZoaZ; mouseover:y0pDld; mouseout:dq0hvd;fv1Rjc:jbFSOd;CrfLRd:SzACGe;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: March 17, 2020

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Dear Cannon Falls Area Families:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As a follow-up to the email you received on March 15th regarding school closure, please see the important information below regarding free meals for every student, temporary childcare for emergency workers and distance learning.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: All families with children 18 and under may pick up free meals on March 18, 19 and 20 from 10:00 AM - 1:00 PM at the Elementary main entrance. Breakfast and lunch is available for all students and will be packed for multiple days. Meals will be available for pick up on originally scheduled school days. Meals are NOT available during Spring Break. Again, all meals are free!

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Wednesday, March 18 through Friday, March 27: Cannon Kids will be open only to emergency personnel staff, and healthcare workers’ children. Please contact Community Education at 507-263-6800 ext. 1261 for details.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Families not currently registered with Cannon Kids must meet the guidelines for care and will need to complete a brief registration.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: If the closure continues March 30 and beyond, Cannon Kids will continue to operate under these same guidelines.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Spring Break will take place as regularly scheduled, March 23 - 27. Distance learning will not be taking place during this time.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Meals will NOT be available during spring break because district buildings are closed to the public.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We are fortunate that we have supported distance learning through

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . Due to this experience, we are uniquely positioned to address an extended closing and continued learning for our students. Distance Learning Plans for students will be communicated to you

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

em.strong: by the end of the day Friday March 20, 2020

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . These learning plans are for March 30, 2020 and beyond in the event the state continues with the closures.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: The district will be contacting the families in need of internet service by March 20th with options.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Please contact the district first before bringing technology repairs or needs in. Phone lines are open from 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM to call and make arrangements with each building for device repairs or pick up through Friday, March 20, 2020 and closed March 23 - 27, 2020. In the event the Distance Learning Plan goes into effect on March 30, 2020, the phones will remain open from 8:00 AM - 3:00 PM to make arrangements for device repairs or other technology needs.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: For the most up-to-date information about COVID-19 please visit:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: MDH COVID-19 Hotline at 651-201-5414.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Thank you for your understanding, patience, and ongoing support during this rapidly changing situation. The safety and support of our students, families, staff, and communities are our top priority. We are participating in all informational calls with the Minnesota Department of Health and Minnesota Department of Education. We continue to closely monitor the situation, follow guidance from health officials and will keep you informed, as needed, through our regular communication channels (email, phone, website and social media).

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Jeff Sampson, Superintendent

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Cannon Falls Area Schools

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Dear Cannon Falls Area Families:

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: In accordance with direction given this morning by the State of Minnesota,

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: all Cannon Falls Area Public Schools will be closed from Tuesday, March 17 through Friday, March 27, 2020

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: . As you know, this is a rapidly evolving situation; the current closure will be re-evaluated by March 27. We will continue to follow the guidance of the

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: (MDH) and the

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: (MDE).

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We will be open as regularly scheduled Monday, March 16, to allow for families and staff to plan for a possible extended closure;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: however, all after-school activities are canceled beginning Monday, March 16.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: This includes but is not limited to: athletics; activities; Community Education enrichment, recreation, teams, and building rentals. Cannon Kids will be open both before and after school on

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: All buildings will be closed to the public from Monday, March 16 starting at 3:00 PM through Sunday, March 29. This includes the

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: As with any school day, families may choose to keep their students at home on Monday March 16. This will be considered an excused absence. Please remember to contact the school attendance line for your student(s) should you choose to keep them home.

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: We are however, planning to prepare your child with instructional materials on Monday if the State of Minnesota gives direction to extend the closure timeline past March 27.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: We are fortunate that we have supported distance learning through

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: , since last year. Due to this experience, we are uniquely positioned to address an extended closing and continue learning for our students. The schedule will be as follows:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Monday, March 16 - School will run on normal hours. All district buildings close at 3:00 PM. *Cannon Kids will remain open as scheduled for current families.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Tuesday, March 17 through Friday, March 20 -

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: School Closed - No Distance Learning. All Elementary Conferences will be held by phone conference during the time you scheduled online. Teachers will call parents.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Saturday, March 21 through March, 29

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;
span.strong: Schools are closed for Spring Break. District buildings closed to the public.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Monday, March 30 - To Be Determined. Stay tuned for further communication.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Spring Break will take place as regularly scheduled, March 23 - 27. There will be no BOLD Days during this time.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Monday, March 16: Cannon Kids will be open for their regular schedule.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Tuesday, March 17 through Friday, March 27: Cannon Kids will be open only to emergency personnel staff, and healthcare workers’ children. Please contact Community Education at 507-263-6800 ext. 1261 for details. Students should bring a bag breakfast and lunch during this period.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Families not currently registered with Cannon Kids and meet the guidelines for care can complete a brief registration.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: For the most up-to-date information about COVID-19 please visit:

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: 0; padding-left: 0; text-align: left; text-indent: 0;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline;

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: You can also call the MDH COVID-19 Hotline at 651-201-5414.

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Thank you for your understanding, patience, and ongoing support during this rapidly changing situation. The safety and support of our students, families, staff, and communities are our top priority. We are participating in all informational calls with the Minnesota Department of Health and Minnesota Department of Education. We continue to closely monitor the situation, follow guidance from health officials and will keep you informed, as needed, through our regular communication channels (email, phone, website and social media).

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Sincerely,

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Jeff Sampson, Superintendent

p.style: margin-left: 0; margin-right: -36px; padding-left: 0; text-align: justify; text-indent: 0; white-space: normal;

span.style: font-family: Open Sans; font-size: 18px; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal; text-decoration: normal; vertical-align: baseline;

p.span: Cannon Falls Area Schools

div.p: March 13, 2020
Cannon Falls Families and Staff:
As you know, the situation surrounding the outbreak of the novel (new) coronavirus disease (now called COVID-19) is rapidly
evolving and the information and recommendations are changing daily as new information becomes available. At Cannon
Falls Area Schools, we understand staff and parents may have questions and concerns, especially as it relates to your
children’s safety and education. As the number of those affected continues to grow closer to our communities, we continue
to plan ahead and prepare for the safety and education of our children.
Cannon Falls Area Schools is following Minnesota Department of Health (MDH) and Center for Disease Control and
Prevention (CDC) recommendations regarding this emerging public health concern. At this time, the risk of becoming sick
with COVID-19 is low, including for people in Minnesota schools. With that said, we are in constant communication with
MDH and the CDC about that risk and will follow their recommendations for school districts.
As a School District, we are employing strategic disinfectant procedures. These include frequent disinfecting of surfaces. We
have also taken a proactive approach to ensure cleaning practices are being implemented on the buses.
We also are encouraging the following standard illness prevention practices to reduce the spread of all viruses at school and
in your homes, including:
● Wash your hands often with soap and water for at least 20 seconds.
● Cover your coughs and sneezes with a tissue or your sleeve – not in your hands
● Avoid touching your eyes, nose and mouth
● Avoid close contact with people who are sick
● Stay home from school, work, and activities if you are ill
● Clean and disinfect frequently touched objects and surfaces
Please stay tuned for further updates as we are planning for the continued education of your children if our school district
were to close due to recommendations from the Department of Health.
Additionally, the Minnesota Department of Health created a school-specific website,
https://www.health.state.mn.us/diseases/coronavirus/schools.html, with recommendations and information regarding the
virus. A coronavirus hotline also has been established: 651-201-3920.
Sincerely,
Jeff Sampson, Superintendent
